_source.short_desc: CallRail's Call Tracking helps you understand what makes your phone right and personalize inbound call experiences.
_source.long_desc: CallRail's Call Tracking makes it easy for businesses of all sizes to turn more leads into better customers. Serving more than 200,000 businesses and integrating with leading marketing and sales software, our Call Tracking and analytics solutions helps you understand what makes your phone ring and which ad, campaign, or search term got their attention before you pick up the phone.
_source.pricing_details: Pricing begins at $45 per month, and includes 5 local phone numbers and 250 minutes. Every account includes session-level tracking, call recording, our top integrations, and unlimited clients & users.
_source.target_audience: CallRail is perfect for marketing agencies, data-driven marketers, multi-location businesses, small business owners, and anyone who relies on quality inbounds calls to grow their business.

category_features.name: Alerts / Escalation
category_features.definition: Define a process for transferring calls/tickets to management

category_features.name: Blended Call Center
category_features.definition: A call center that both makes and receives calls

category_features.name: Call Logging
category_features.definition: Keep a record of all calls in and out of a call center

category_features.name: Call Recording
category_features.definition: Record the audio of phone conversations for quality assurance purposes

category_features.name: Call Scripting
category_features.definition: Provide agents with a typical response for common call subject matter

category_features.name: Campaign Management
category_features.definition: Create a collection of marketing actions to complete specific goals

category_features.name: IVR / Voice Recognition
category_features.definition: Read and accept a combination of touch tone keypad selections and voice inputs and provide the appropriate prerecorded voice response

category_features.name: Inbound Call Center
category_features.definition: A call center that primarily receives calls, typically customer service focused

category_features.name: Manual Dialer
category_features.definition: Agents choose who to call and when

category_features.name: Outbound Call Center
category_features.definition: A call center that primarily makes calls, typically sales focused

category_features.name: Predictive Dialer
category_features.definition: System calls multiple numbers at once and connects the agent to the first number that answers

category_features.name: Progressive Dialer
category_features.definition: System makes individual calls from a list as soon as the agent is available

category_features.name: Queue Management
category_features.definition: Monitor wait time and abandonment for incoming requests that have not been routed

category_features.name: Real-Time Chat
category_features.definition: Engage in direct, instant messaging

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: AI/Machine Learning
category_features.definition: Software program that continuously adjusts its behavior based on observed data

category_features.name: Alerts/Notifications
category_features.definition: Alerts/notifications within the system

category_features.name: Customizable Scoring
category_features.definition: Adjust the weighting of various scoring criteria to control how scores are calculated

category_features.name: Data Enrichment
category_features.definition: Combines data from internal sources with disparate data from other internal systems or external sources

category_features.name: Demographic / Firmographic Data
category_features.definition: Characteristics for segmenting companies or customers

category_features.name: Lead Distribution
category_features.definition: Manually or automatically assign leads to sales reps

category_features.name: Lead Qualification
category_features.definition: Score a lead on their quality or likelihood to buy based on certain behaviors

category_features.name: Multiple Scoring Models
category_features.definition: Create multiple models or equations for generating scores

category_features.name: Predictive Analytics
category_features.definition: Predict future data based on historical data sets

category_features.name: Prioritization
category_features.definition: Arrange activities and tasks based on their relative importance

category_features.name: Process/Workflow Automation
category_features.definition: Design workflow paths once and apply the logic to enable automatic creation of future processes and workflows

category_features.name: Call Center Management
category_features.definition: Manage all call center activities including call monitoring, call recording, call answering, call transfer, etc.

category_features.name: Contact Management
category_features.definition: Store and find contact information such as names, addresses, and social media accounts

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: Access Controls/Permissions
category_features.definition: Define levels of authorization for access to specific files/folders

category_features.name: Alerts/Notifications
category_features.definition: Alerts/notifications within the system

category_features.name: Call Conferencing
category_features.definition: Facilitate virtual conferences that connect multiple people remotely

category_features.name: Call Monitoring
category_features.definition: Listen in on live phone conversations to train and assess agent performance

category_features.name: Call Recording
category_features.definition: Facilitate virtual conferences that connect multiple people remotely

category_features.name: Call Routing
category_features.definition: The procedure of sending voice calls to a specific queue based on predetermined criteria

category_features.name: Call Screening
category_features.definition: Access caller ID Information including number of the caller to decide how to treat the call

category_features.name: Contact Management
category_features.definition: Store and find contact information such as names, addresses, and social media accounts

category_features.name: IVR / Voice Recognition
category_features.definition: Reads and accepts a combination of touch tone keypad selections and voice inputs to provide the appropriate prerecorded voice response

category_features.name: Online Voice Transmission
category_features.definition: Transmit voice and other information digitally

category_features.name: SIP Trunking
category_features.definition: Session Initiation protocol (SIP) trunking enables the connectivity to send and receive calls over the internet

category_features.name: Unified Communications
category_features.definition: Consolidate and integrate communication tools as one platform or entity to enhance business communication and collaboration

category_features.name: Voicemail Transcription
category_features.definition: Transcribe voicemail audio messages to written text that is sent over email

related_products.short_desc: Webex brings together Calling, Meeting and Messaging modes of collaboration into a seamless, inclusive and intelligent experience.
related_products.features:
Webex brings together Calling, Meeting and Messaging modes of collaboration into a seamless, inclusive and intelligent experience.

Make meetings more interactive and engaging
-	Reduce disruptions with background noise removal and voice enhancement
-	Enable audiences to share their reactions with animated emojis and gesture recognition
-	Improve audience engagement with next-gen dynamic polling and Q&A by Slido
-	Customize the stage layout to focus on the content and people that matters most

related_products.short_desc: Zendesk offers a fully integrated call center built right into its support platform.
related_products.features: Zendesk offers a fully integrated call center built right into its support platform. Agents can handle calls in the same workspace as all other channels. This cloud based support platform gives them full context on customer history to help resolve the most complex and urgent issues faster. Teams that use Zendesk see a 20% reduction in support costs and a 27% increase in agent productivity. If you already have a call center, you can seamlessly integrate it with an API connection to our help desk.

related_products.short_desc: LiveAgent helps businesses thrive in customer service. Create a customer community, increase customer satisfaction and succeed!
related_products.features: LiveAgent can help you answer inbound customer calls and integrate call center functionality into an all-in-one multi-channel help desk solution. Centralize phone calls from your website or landline into a single place. Choose your VoIP provider, connect unlimited SIP trunks and local numbers, route and record calls. With LiveAgent, providing world-class customer service is easy. Start your free trial, no credit card required.

related_products.short_desc: Talkdesk is intuitive, cloud-based contact center software with advanced features, comprehensive reporting and seamless integrations.
related_products.features: Talkdesk is next-generation cloud-based call center software that helps you connect with your customers. The easy-to-use interface offers robust functionality with advanced features, comprehensive reporting and seamless integrations with 25+ business tools to empower sales and service teams to have personalized, effective conversations with customers.

related_products.short_desc: GoToConnect Support Center gives supervisors and agents indispensable tools to improve the quality of customer interactions.
related_products.features: GoToConnect combines the power and reliability of Jive's cloud VoIP phone systems with GoToMeeting's web, audio and video conferencing into one simple, reliable and flexible solution. GoToConnect Support Center enhances GoToConnect by giving supervisors and agents indispensable tools to improve the quality of customer interactions.

related_products.short_desc: Service Cloud 360, the world's #1 customer service platform, empowers companies to drive seamless engagement across the entire customer
related_products.features: Transform your call center with proactive and personalized service. Service teams can exceed customer expectations with accurate purchase history and a full view of prior customer conversations. Give your customers a consistent and efficient service experience on every call with Service Cloud Voice. Agents now have instant access to a complete view of the customer and better tools and insights. That way, they can close cases faster.

related_products.short_desc: Bitrix24 is#1 free CRM and call center software used by over 8 million companies. 100% free for up to 12 agents. Cloud and open source.
related_products.features: Bitrix24 is free call center software unlike any other. If you choose a cloud version, you can start calling and receiving phone calls within minutes. You pay only if you need to have more than 12 employees, want to rent a phone number, SIP connector or use Bitrix24 telephony for outbound calls. You can also purchase self hosted editions of Bitrix24 if require source code access or would like to deploy Bitrix24 on premise.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud contact center software that offers VR, skills-based routing, AI, call blending, and analytics.
related_products.features: NICE CXone is the world's #1 cloud customer experience platform. Delivering omnichannel routing, analytics, workforce optimization, automation, and AI, CXone empowers organizations of all sizes to provide exceptional customer experiences.

related_products.short_desc: Easy to set up, easy to use. Dialpad Call Center Software is feature-packed, affordable, secure, reliable, and backed by 24x7 support.
related_products.features: Easy to set up, easy to use. Affordable, feature-packed, cloud-based. Dialpad's call center software improves customer experience and agent effectiveness, resulting in better conversations. Monitor and coach agents from anywhere with robust analytics dashboards. Automate tasks and capture insights to save time. Improve CSAT, FCR, close tickets, and keep your customers happy. Use real time recommendations to boost agent confidence and give them answers they need to help customers in the moment.

related_products.short_desc: Agile CRM is a complete sales, marketing and service suite designed to let SMBs to sell and market like the Fortune 500.
related_products.features: Agile CRM Call Center Software - Call center CRM software helps your customer support team with powerful tools to close tickets faster, ensure customers are successful using your product. Features with advanced telephony integrations, Outbound calls, Inbound calls, Call routing, Help desk ticketing, Tag-based calling, Help desk groups, Call recording, Call notes, Call scripts, Call reports and many more.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud Contact Center with Practical AI- Inbound, Outbound, ACD, IVR, Predictive Dialer, Chat, Call Recording, and CRM Integrations.
related_products.features: Five9 is the all-in-one call center software that uses Practical AI to increase your team's effectiveness on the phone, web, email, chat and more. Use smart dialers to give your agents more time with live prospects. Get your customers to the right agent with intelligent routing. Use customer intent data to suggest the next best action to your agents. Analyze and report on performance in real-time. All with 24/7 customer support. See why 2000+ customer trust Five9.

similar_products.short_desc: Call center software for customer-centric teams. Easily integrate with 80+ CRMs and other business tools to grow your business!
similar_products.features: Aircall is the #1 Call Center Software and surfaces valuable context from your helpdesk, CRM, live chat, and e-commerce software to anticipate customer needs on every call, helping you reduce wait times and boost rep efficiency. Sales Teams love the Click-to-Dial Features & Automatic Call Logging. Join 9,000+ companies that trust Aircall to strengthen their customer relationships with industry-leading call center features like: SMS, advanced call routing, IVR, analytics + more.

similar_products.short_desc: Zendesk offers a fully integrated call center built right into its support platform.
similar_products.features: Zendesk offers a fully integrated call center built right into its support platform. Agents can handle calls in the same workspace as all other channels. This cloud based support platform gives them full context on customer history to help resolve the most complex and urgent issues faster. Teams that use Zendesk see a 20% reduction in support costs and a 27% increase in agent productivity. If you already have a call center, you can seamlessly integrate it with an API connection to our help desk.

similar_products.short_desc: HGS Agent X is an AI-Powered Cloud-Based Call Center Solution that helps businesses to innovate within the call center.
similar_products.features: HGS Agent X is a fully customizable, unified AI-powered cloud-based call center software that facilitates quick resolutions, boosts quality management processes, and helps offer a top-notch customer experience. With HGS Agent X, you pay for only the features your business needs. Streamline your agent workflow while enhancing agent and customer interactions by providing a simplified customer 360? view.

similar_products.short_desc: Powerful OUTBOUND CALL CENTER platform. Reach 4x more leads w/ NO awkward pause. No set up fees. Free trial (no credit card needed).
similar_products.features: PhoneBurner is for OUTBOUND CALL CENTERS. Have more LIVE conversations in 15-minutes guaranteed! We're so confident you'll boost outbound sales with our power dialer, you can use our full product for FREE without a credit card. Here's why we're confident: 1) Dial leads 4x faster 2) No awkward pauses after contact answers 3) Drop voicemails/emails in 1-click 4) Automate post call workflows 5) No special equipment needed. Powerful yet easy to use!

similar_products.short_desc: Service Cloud 360, the world's #1 customer service platform, empowers companies to drive seamless engagement across the entire customer
similar_products.features: Transform your call center with proactive and personalized service. Service teams can exceed customer expectations with accurate purchase history and a full view of prior customer conversations. Give your customers a consistent and efficient service experience on every call with Service Cloud Voice. Agents now have instant access to a complete view of the customer and better tools and insights. That way, they can close cases faster.

similar_products.short_desc: Alvaria Cloud is a cloud contact center platform built for high-availability and backed by SLAs to support enterprise-scale deployments
similar_products.features: Alvaria Cloud is the only enterprise cloud contact center solution that allows you to adopt best-of-breed Customer Experience (CX) and Workforce Engagement Management (WEM) applications modularly. Start with one or more applications and then add applications with ease when ready for additional capabilities, as your needs change. With the Alvaria Cloud Platform, you have the advantage of knowing that all provisioning, security, user management and other administrative tasks are already configured

similar_products.short_desc: 3CX is an all in one call center solution for calls & chats. Includes advanced call queues, reporting, recording, and CRM integration
similar_products.features: 3CX is an all-in-one call center solution to communicate with customers via voice, video & chat. Offers advanced queue strategies set to individuals or groups. Integrates with various CRMs & MS 365. Includes call recordings & reports. A single interface to answer customer live chat, facebook messages & SMS. Call work flows to eliminate time intensive tasks for agents. Accessible remotely with free mobile apps for iOS & Android. Can be deployed on premise or in the cloud. Get it for free!

similar_products.short_desc: Twilio Flex is a fully programmable cloud contact center platform that gives businesses complete control at every layer of the stack.
similar_products.features:
Twilio Flex gives companies complete control over how, when and what they deploy. Built on the trusted Twilio customer engagement platform that powers over a half million agents today, Twilio Flex helps businesses rapidly deploy tailored cloud contact centers free from the limitations of SaaS applications.

Easily augment your existing contact center with remote agents, new channels, or an intelligent IVR and chatbot, or move your entire contact center to the cloud.

similar_products.short_desc: Dextr is a contact center as a service (CCaaS) solution powered by Amazon Connect, that enhances call center while reducing costs.
similar_products.features: Dextr is a contact center as a service (CCaaS) solution powered by Amazon Connect that combines a full-featured agent call control and supervisor interface with a rich library of cloud services at an extremely affordable pay-per-use price.  Unlike expensive and time-consuming custom development, Dextr deploys immediately, enhances the expanding capabilities of Amazon Connect, and costs a fraction of traditional solutions

similar_products.short_desc: Dramatically increase contact and lead conversion rates with Convoso's omnichannel contact center software.
similar_products.features: Convoso's cloud-based, omnichannel predictive dialing software is the most complete solution on the market for outbound call centers with 20+ seats. Our industry-leading Answering Machine Detection rate - 97% accurate - coupled with our new Caller ID reputation management initiative means your agents will connect with real people - and not flagged as 'Scam Likely'. Factor in our intuitively automated workflows and see your contact rates increase by 3-4X when you switch to Convoso.

similar_products.short_desc: Global conversation analytics provider with a full suite of contact center tools to align teams around an optimized customer experience
similar_products.features:
CallTrackingMetrics is a global conversation analytics provider giving marketers data to make confident strategy decisions. Over 100,000 users, including The Washington Post, Verizon Connect, and ServiceMaster, rely on CTM to make data-driven advertising decisions. CTM integrates with core tools like Google Ads and Analytics, Hubspot, Salesforce, Zoom, and Facebook. 

Align teams around valuable data with lead management tools, reporting, and smart routing to optimize the customer experience.

similar_products.short_desc: Keona Health Desk is an EHR-integrated Healthcare CRM, Patient Access, and Appointment Scheduling platform for contact centers and DTC
similar_products.features: "Health Desk" is an AI-powered healthcare CRM platform. It integrates with an PM/EHR in real-time to activate intelligent scheduling of patient appointments (both self-service and contact center versions). In addition, Health Desk can be used to manage other workflows including: nurse triage, telemedicine, referral services, prescription refills, post discharge follow-up and other marketing/clinical programs.

similar_products.short_desc: GoToConnect Support Center gives supervisors and agents indispensable tools to improve the quality of customer interactions.
similar_products.features: GoToConnect combines the power and reliability of Jive's cloud VoIP phone systems with GoToMeeting's web, audio and video conferencing into one simple, reliable and flexible solution. GoToConnect Support Center enhances GoToConnect by giving supervisors and agents indispensable tools to improve the quality of customer interactions.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Call Recording software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Call Recording tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Call Recording software allows organizations to obtain records of employees' interactions with customers. This type of software provides full-time, random, and on-demand recording, allows employees to save, sort, and retrieve call recordings on their computers. For related solutions see also: Call Center software, Customer Service software and Help Desk software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Contact Center software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Contact Center tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Contact Center software automates and standardizes the process of receiving and responding to customer requests across different communication channels.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Relationship Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Relationship Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Relationship Management (CRM) software enables customer interaction, support and relationship management. The purpose of a CRM application is to enable organizations to better manage their customers through the introduction of reliable systems, processes and procedures. Customer Relationship Management software integrates organizational processes across marketing, sales and customer services. CRM software is related to Contract Management software and Online CRM software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Service software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Service tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Service software enables an organization to manage and track customer relationships and support services. From trouble ticket tracking to complaint resolution reporting, Customer Service software solutions allow organizations to manage and assess the quality of their interactions with customers. Customer Service applications also assist in the management and distribution of an internal knowledge base, providing customer service representatives with the information necessary to resolve customer complaints. Customer Service software is related to Call Center software, Help Desk software and Knowledge Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Help Desk software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Help Desk tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Help Desk software enables organizations to respond more efficiently to users. Support software can aid in answering technical and functional questions by providing improved methodologies for ticket tracking, IT management and customer service support. Integrating these elements improves the ability of customer service departments to provide fast and effective support to employees, end users and customers. Help Desk solutions can also facilitate the flow of new information from users, contributing to an organization's existing knowledge base. Help Desk software is related to Call Center software and Customer Service software .

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top IVR software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of IVR tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Interactive Voice Response (IVR) software, allows call centers, help desks and other organizations to create menus which the caller can navigate using spoken commands or their telephone keys. IVR software is mainly used for systems that allow callers to select information or enter data without the need for assistance. IVR systems can also be used to route callers to the appropriate department within an organization, based on their answers to qualifying questions.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Online CRM software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Online CRM tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Online CRM software enables web-based customer interaction, support and relationship management. Online customer relationship management applications provide customers with access to an organization's knowledge base assets, allowing customers to pursue a self-guided path to resolving product-related issues, either via the web or over the phone. Online CRM solutions can help increase the efficiency and utility of a call center, website or help desk by empowering customers to resolve issues on their own without engaging with customer service staff. Online CRM software is related to Customer Relationship Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Speech Analytics software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Speech Analytics tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Speech Analytics software helps organizations capture, track, and analyze ongoing or recorded calls. These tools offer sentiment/emotional analysis, language detection, automatic transcription, as well as other functionality to monitor customer experience.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Telephony software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Telephony tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Telephony software automates the electronic transmission of voice and data, often to improve call center efficiency. These applications allow all types of organizations increased flexibility in managing their incoming and outgoing call options as well as a variety of fax and data features. In addition to optimizing an organization's internal operations, Telephony software also offers expanded outgoing capabilities, providing an infrastructure for call center management, help desk operations, predictive dialing applications, Customer Relationship Management (CRM) solutions and telemarketing software.

All your customer interactions live in a single, dynamic interface with features like web widgets, pre-defined ticket responses, and a full customer history. Get up and running quickly, and expect to see results even faster.

related_products.short_desc: RingCentral phone system can automatically record inbound and outbound calls for individual users or inbound calls for departments.

The RingCentral MVP Automatic Call Recording feature easily enables recording of your inbound and outbound calls. It's easy to setup! With just a few clicks, admins can enable this feature for one or multiple users. 

Save as much as 100,000 recordings per account! Recordings can be downloaded for review and playback, and are emailed automatically to users.

related_products.short_desc: World's leading cloud-based call center software. Call recording, monitoring, analytic routing and customer-centric features.
related_products.features: Talkdesk Enterprise Contact Center Platform empowers companies to make customer experience a competitive advantage. With enterprise class performance, consumer-like ease of use and features like call recording, Talkdesk easily adapts to the evolving needs of sales and support teams and their end-customers, resulting in increased customer satisfaction, productivity and cost savings. Over 1,400 innovative enterprises around the world rely on Talkdesk to power their customer interactions.

related_products.short_desc: GoToConnect combines Jive's VoIP phone systems with GoToMeeting's video conferencing into one simple, reliable and flexible solution.
related_products.features: GoToConnect (formerly Jive) combines cloud VoIP phone systems with GoToMeeting's web, audio and video capabilities into one simple, flexible solution. Users can meet, talk, and collaborate via web browser, desktop application, or desk phone with features ranging from virtual voicemail, and call forwarding, to secure video conferencing and screen sharing. For as low as $19.95 a month, GoToConnect eliminates the hassle and expense of managing multiple collaboration solution providers.

related_products.short_desc: #1 online CRM with call recording. Over 8 million businesses use Bitrix24 as their cloud PBX and CRM.
related_products.features: Looking for CRM with voice recording? That's Bitrix24. Bitrix24 records both incoming and outbound phone calls. If you'd like to forward phone call to your number or mobile phone and have the conversation recorded anyway, our CRM lets you do that.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud contact center software that offers VR, skills-based routing, AI, call blending, and analytics.
related_products.features: NICE CXone Recording provides secure, full-featured call and screen recording for audio and digital channels to satisfy contact center compliance and quality needs.  Adhere to compliance regulations with capabilities to meet GDPR, PCI and HIPPA standards, including encryption, automated and on-demand masking, consent-based recording, extensive retention options, and Key Management.

related_products.short_desc: Gong records and analyzes your team's calls via web conferencing and phone, and surfaces recommendations to help you win more deals.
related_products.features: Gong unlocks your most value data set - your customer conversations - by recording and analyzing your team's calls made via web conferencing, dialers, and phone. However you makes calls or whichever CRM software your team relies on to track sales: Gong integrates with it. Gong empowers your entire go-to-market organization with real-time data, time-saving automation, and actionable next steps to positively influence the outcome of deals.

related_products.short_desc: Dialpad modernizes communication technology, putting voice, messaging, meetings, and video on any device.
related_products.features: Dialpad Sell is an effective sales dialer for sales organizations of any size. Dialpad Sell offers multiple real-time and post-call sales coaching features that drive efficiency. With features like Real-Time Recommendations, answers to common prospect questions pop up when specific keywords are mentioned during an active call. Direct integrations with other essential tools like Salesforce, G Suite and more means accurate activity logging, whether your reps are at their desks or out in the field.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud Contact Center and Call Recording with Practical AI - Inbound, Outbound, ACD, IVR, 4 Dialers, Chat, Call Recording, and CRMs.
related_products.features: Five9 Call Recording Software helps track, retain and report on every conversation in your call center. Use the recordings for agent training purposes, to monitor performance, and to ensure quality of service. The software includes robust filtering capabilities to quickly identify any recordings that require review. FTP support allows you to retain and store calls for compliance or agent training purposes. Automatically sync with all leading CRMs. See why 2000+ customers trust Five9.

similar_products.features: Give your prospects and customers the best call experience possible by leveraging call recordings to improve rep performance. Join 9,000+ companies that trust Aircall to strengthen their customer and prospect relationships with first-class phone features like: SMS, advanced call routing, IVR, analytics, power dialer, call tagging, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: Outreach is the only solution to integrate sales engagement, conversation intelligence, and revenue intelligence into one platform.

Deliver revenue growth with the platform trusted by more than 5,000 companies such as Adobe, Tableau, Okta, Splunk, DocuSign, and SAP.

similar_products.short_desc: Conversational intelligence platform that helps sales teams, improve performance, and reduce acquisition costs.
similar_products.features:
Salesken is a Conversational intelligence platform that helps sales teams, improve performance, and reduce acquisition costs. 

Our customers include the world's largest companies in Education, Finance and Software. They use Salesken to analyze every sales conversation and assist their reps in real-time talking points.

similar_products.short_desc: Mindtickle's Call AI solution helps reps access all of the insights, content, and training they need in one place.
similar_products.features: Mindtickle's Call AI solution helps world-class companies be ready to grow revenue by recording, transcribing, and analyzing sales calls for customer insights and coaching. With conversational insights tightly integrated into sales training and content programs, Call AI helps revenue teams achieve a continuous state of excellence and be ready for every selling situation.

similar_products.short_desc: Cloud-based audio, voice, and video API platform. Winner of 'Best in Media APIs' from the 2020 API Awards.
similar_products.features: Dolby.io is the cloud-based audio, voice, and video API platform used to transform media and communication apps. Incorporate life like HD audio and video into applications to provide a premium user experience. With a few lines of code, improve speech leveling, noise reduction, loudness correction and speech isolation in your media. Remove the time consuming, manual and costly process of processing audio, by getting insights into the make up and quality of audio without having to listen to it.

similar_products.short_desc: Start for Free with LiveAgent and provide excellent customer service with the ultimate help desk solution for companies of all sizes.
similar_products.features:
LiveAgent is a cloud-based Help Desk Software with over 200+ compatible integrations.

Streamline all customer communication channels and manage them from a single shared company inbox.

Enjoy social media integration, unlimited ticket history, call recordings, hybrid ticket streams, and more.

Companies like BMW, Yamaha, Huawei, Orange, or Forbesfone use LiveAgent to deliver customer wow to 150M end-users worldwide.

similar_products.short_desc: Koncert's high velocity Sales Engagement Dialers and Cadence platforms increase B2B sales productivity by up to 800%. Koncert.com
similar_products.features: Koncert, formerly ConnectLeader, is a long-time leader in the B2B Sales Engagement industry, with 10+ years of dialer technology innovation. Koncert's platforms are sales-role specific dialers, created for a wide variety of sales workflows. Koncert offers two power Parallel Dialer options, AI Dialer and Agent-Assisted Dialer; as well as two single line workflow dialers and Click Dialer?, which all integrate directly into CRMs.

similar_products.short_desc: PhoneBurner is a Power Dialer and Sales Acceleration Platform with Call Recording, Smart Lead Distribution, and Real-Time Reporting.
similar_products.features: Call Recording and Power Dialing in One Powerful Software! Powerful yet easy to use!

similar_products.short_desc: CTM lets you record and transcribe phone calls giving you data to confidently make customer experience & sales coaching decisions.

CallTrackingMetrics is a global conversation analytics provider giving marketers data to make confident strategy decisions. Over 100,000 users, including The Washington Post, Verizon Connect, and ServiceMaster, rely on CTM to make data-driven advertising decisions. CTM integrates with core tools marketers use every day like Google Ads and Analytics, Hubspot, Salesforce, Zoom, and Facebook. 

Key speech analytics features include call recording, transcriptions, and automated keyword analysis.

similar_products.short_desc: Fastcall is a Salesforce CTI solution that helps Salesforce users manage inbound and outbound calls, videocalls and texts.

Fastcall is an Easier Way To Manage & Automate Phone / SMS / Video In Salesforce.

Fastcall is a Salesforce native app and Salesforce licenses are required.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Call Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Call Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Call Accounting software helps businesses gain insights into call logs, telephone usage and cost trends. Call Accounting solutions help create accountability for telecom resources across corporate departments. They also help to eliminate vendor over-billings by automating invoice processing. Within organizations, Call Accounting software helps to identify unused telecom resources as well as to offer insight into call and cost trends. Call Accounting software is related to Telecom Expense Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Call Center software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Call Center tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Call Center software automates and standardizes the process of receiving and responding to customer phone calls. These solutions enable better monitoring of the customer experience, workflow management and evaluation of employee performance. Whether designed for virtual or site-based locations, Call Center applications manage and catalog the process of customer calls and often allow customers to track the progress of their request via the internet. Call Center software is related to Customer Service software and Help Desk software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Contact Center Quality Assurance software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Contact Center Quality Assurance tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Contact Center Quality Assurance (QA) software helps businesses evaluate agent performance, monitor team productivity, provide individual feedback or coaching sessions, and measure customer satisfaction.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top IVR software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of IVR tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Interactive Voice Response (IVR) software, allows call centers, help desks and other organizations to create menus which the caller can navigate using spoken commands or their telephone keys. IVR software is mainly used for systems that allow callers to select information or enter data without the need for assistance. IVR systems can also be used to route callers to the appropriate department within an organization, based on their answers to qualifying questions.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Telecom Expense Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Telecom Expense Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Telecom Expense Management software automates the process of monitoring, auditing and reducing telecom billing expenses. These applications aid call centers, help desks and other organizations measure, manage, predict and optimize expenditures related to their telephone systems. Telecom Expense Management solutions also aid in distributing key performance data throughout an enterprise as well as forecasting for infrastructure investment and eliminating internal fraud. Telecom Expense Management software is related to Billing and Provisioning software and Call Accounting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Telephony software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Telephony tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Telephony software automates the electronic transmission of voice and data, often to improve call center efficiency. These applications allow all types of organizations increased flexibility in managing their incoming and outgoing call options as well as a variety of fax and data features. In addition to optimizing an organization's internal operations, Telephony software also offers expanded outgoing capabilities, providing an infrastructure for call center management, help desk operations, predictive dialing applications, Customer Relationship Management (CRM) solutions and telemarketing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Wireless Expense Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Wireless Expense Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Wireless Expense Management software automates the process of monitoring, auditing and reducing wireless billing expenses. These applications aid businesses and other organizations measure, manage, predict and optimize expenditures related to their mobile telephone systems. Wireless Expense Management solutions also aid in tracking mobile device assets, preserving the security data on wireless devices and eliminating fraudulent use of these devices. Wireless Expense Management software is related to Telecom Expense Management software and Call Accounting software.

pricing_plans.name: Conversion Analytics
pricing_plans.description: The plan includes 5 local numbers, 250 minutes, 100 text messages, 10,000 call transcription minutes. Extra payment for additional usage.

pricing_plans.name: Marketing Analytics
pricing_plans.description: The plan includes 5 local numbers, 250 minutes, 100 text messages, 1000 form submissions. Extra payment for additional usage.

pricing_plans.name: Analytics Suite
pricing_plans.description: The plan includes 5 local numbers, 250 minutes, 100 text messages, 10,000 call transcription minutes, 1000 form submissions. Extra payment for additional usage.

pricing_plans.description: The plan includes 5 local numbers, 250 local minutes, 100 text (SMS) messages. Extra payment for additional usage.

pricing_plans.name: Call Tracking Plan 2
pricing_plans.description: The plan includes 5 local numbers, 1000 local minutes, 100 text (SMS) messages. Extra payment for additional usage.

pricing_plans.description: The plan includes 20 local numbers, 2500 local minutes, 500 text (SMS) messages. Extra payment for additional usage.
